Name: Finding Alina
About the game: Point-and-click in first person view built with static images. Click on the screen to change scenes/rooms. Click on items on a scene to put them on your inventory. Click on items on inventory to use them on a scene. Click 'Drop' area to return an item to your inventory. Use keybord and mouse to input passwords. You can not combine items in your inventory or outside.
